ripSysEntry.name: ripSysEntry
ripSysEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one instance of RIP running on the system.

ripSysInstance.name: ripSysInstance
ripSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of RIP to which this row corresponds. This value links the instance of RIP to an instance of IPX running on the system (i.e. the value of ripSysInstance should be the same as a value of ipxSysInstance). This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ripSysState.name: ripSysState
ripSysState.description: Indicates the operational state of this instance of RIP.

ripSysIncorrectPackets.name: ripSysIncorrectPackets
ripSysIncorrectPackets.description: The number of times that an incorrectly formatted RIP packet was received.

sapSysEntry.name: sapSysEntry
sapSysEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one instance of SAP running on the system.

sapSysInstance.name: sapSysInstance
sapSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of SAP to which this row corresponds. This value links the instance of SAP to an instance of IPX running on the system (i.e. the value of SApSysInstance should be the same as a value of ipxSysInstance). This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

sapSysState.name: sapSysState
sapSysState.description: Indicates the operational state of this instance of SAP.

sapSysIncorrectPackets.name: sapSysIncorrectPackets
sapSysIncorrectPackets.description: The number of times that an incorrectly formatted SAP packet was received.

ripCircEntry.name: ripCircEntry
ripCircEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one circuit known to the system.

ripCircSysInstance.name: ripCircSysInstance
ripCircSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of RIP and IPX (via ipxSysInstance) to which this entry corresponds. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ripCircIndex.name: ripCircIndex
ripCircIndex.description: The identifier of this circuit, unique within the instance of RIP. This value corresponds to the circuit identifier found in ipxCircIndex. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

ripCircState.name: ripCircState
ripCircState.description: Indicates whether RIP information may be sent/received over this circuit.

ripCircPace.name: ripCircPace
ripCircPace.description: The maximum pace, in packets per second, at which RIP packets may be sent on this circuit.

ripCircUpdate.name: ripCircUpdate
ripCircUpdate.description: The RIP periodic update interval, in seconds.

ripCircAgeMultiplier.name: ripCircAgeMultiplier
ripCircAgeMultiplier.description: The holding multiplier for information received in RIP periodic updates.

ripCircPacketSize.name: ripCircPacketSize
ripCircPacketSize.description: The RIP packet size used on this circuit.

ripCircOutPackets.name: ripCircOutPackets
ripCircOutPackets.description: The number of RIP packets sent on this circuit.

ripCircInPackets.name: ripCircInPackets
ripCircInPackets.description: The number of RIP packets received on this circuit.

sapCircEntry.name: sapCircEntry
sapCircEntry.description: Each entry corresponds to one circuit known to the system.

sapCircSysInstance.name: sapCircSysInstance
sapCircSysInstance.description: The unique identifier of the instance of SAP and IPX (via ipxSysInstance) to which this entry corresponds. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

sapCircIndex.name: sapCircIndex
sapCircIndex.description: The identifier of this circuit, unique within the instance of SAP. This value corresponds to the circuit identifier found in ipxCircIndex. This value may be written only when creating a new entry in the table.

sapCircState.name: sapCircState
sapCircState.description: Indicates whether SAP information may be sent/received over this circuit.

sapCircPace.name: sapCircPace
sapCircPace.description: The maximum pace, in packets per second, at which SAP packets may be sent on this circuit.

sapCircUpdate.name: sapCircUpdate
sapCircUpdate.description: The SAP periodic update interval, in seconds.

sapCircAgeMultiplier.name: sapCircAgeMultiplier
sapCircAgeMultiplier.description: The holding multiplier for information received in SAP periodic updates.

sapCircPacketSize.name: sapCircPacketSize
sapCircPacketSize.description: The SAP packet size used on this circuit.

sapCircGetNearestServerReply.name: sapCircGetNearestServerReply
sapCircGetNearestServerReply.description: Indicates whether to respond to SAP get nearest server requests received on this circuit.

sapCircOutPackets.name: sapCircOutPackets
sapCircOutPackets.description: The number of SAP packets sent on this circuit.

sapCircInPackets.name: sapCircInPackets
sapCircInPackets.description: The number of SAP packets received on this circuit.
